title: two books on ancient history
description:
1)   Hermann Bengtson      Introduction to the ancient history



     this famous german writer(wounded in war action in the south of Russia in 1942)
 
     did a conventional but high-quality docent career in the Adenauer-Brandt years , 

     and this book is exactly the above stated.




2)   BLACK ATHENA REVISITED (Mc Lean editor)


     This is a much funny book: a response to the one written by Blanchard , who 

     defended the non-european origin of almost everything good under the sky of 

     Greece (in particular from Egypt). Articles from good scholars , one of them 

     Liverani. Greece was not a miracle because miracles doesnÃ‚Â´t exist , they seem to

     say. Opinions are free.
